Options.autoCloseOpenBoomerangs: Automatically close open rich tag brackets
Options.scale_Tooltip: Adjust scale of the app on your screen
Options.enableDiscord_Tooltip: If you work with something secret - turn off this option
Options.useDarkMode_Tooltip: Lower the stress on your eyes with dark mode
Options.generateGuids_Tooltip: Uncheck this to let game handle GUIDs
Options.autosaveOption_Tooltip: Autosaves current project to prevent data loss
Options.animateControls_Tooltip: Adds nice touch to some controls
Options.autoUpdate_Tooltip: If there is an update - installs it on app start
Options.downloadPrerelease_Tooltip: Also known as download unstable versions
Options.replaceMissingKeysWithEnglish_Tooltip: Replaces missing keys from English dictionary
Options.useCommentsInsteadOfData_Tooltip: In tabs uses comments defined by you instead of data contained in the tab
Options.importImportVanilla_Tooltip: Whether or not this app should import assets from base game
Options.importImportWorkshop_Tooltip: Whether or not this app should import assets of downloaded mods from Steam Workshop
Options.importImportHooked_Tooltip: Whether or not this app should import assets hooked to a project
Options.generateThumbnailsBeforehand_Tooltip: Increases startup time, but decreases time of creating thumbnails after launch
Options.highlightSearch_Tooltip: Colors matching part of a search query. Very perfomance expensive feature at this moment.
Options.exportSchema_Tooltip: Manage export structure of your projects
Options.automaticallyCheckForErrors_Tooltip:
Will show current error count on the bottom of the app.
Note: this is not optimized and in some cases may be the cause of lags.
If you have a slow PC better keep it disabled.
Options.preferLegacyIDsOverGUIDs_Tooltip:
Prefers legacy IDs (0-65535) instead of GUIDs
Not recommended as game developer gradually switches to GUIDs
Options.autoCloseOpenBoomerangs_Tooltip: Automatically puts '>' at the end of selected region in rich text boxes when '<' is pressed
Options.mainWindowBackgroundBlurRadius_Tooltip: How much blurred background image should be. 0 completely disables this.
Options.alternateBoolValue_Tooltip: Use dropdown with two options 'False' and 'True' instead of checkbox in some places.
Options.forceSoftwareRendering_Tooltip:
May fix some issues related to rendering of the app by forcing it to ignore your installed graphics card and render itself with CPU only.
Be careful enabling this option as this option can either fix or break something.
Note: app will work much slower.
Options.exportSchema_Warning: Warning! This setting is only for advanced users!
Options.exportSchema_Structure_Hint:
{PARAMETER} - Text with specified parameter will be placed in place of this
{PARAMETER > OTHER_PARAMETER} - If first parameter is empty second one will be selected

Mistakes.NE_0000_Desc: ID of {0} [{1}] is in reserved range (from 0 to 2000)
Mistakes.NE_0003_Desc: Character {0} [{1}] has restricted symbols in editor name.
Mistakes.NE_0004_Desc: Character {0} [{1}] is out of projects ID range [{2};{3}].
Mistakes.NE_1002_Desc: Some messages of dialogue {0} will never appear.
Mistakes.NE_1003_Desc: Page #{0} in message #{1} in dialogue {2} is empty.
Mistakes.NE_1004_Desc: Response #{0} in dialogue {1} has a quest to preview, but does not have condition or reward related to the quest
Mistakes.NE_1005_Desc: Response #{0} in dialogue {1} has a quest to preview, has required condition, but does not have correct reward of type 'Quest'
Mistakes.NE_1006_Desc: Response #{0} in dialogue {1} has a quest to preview, but does not have a dialogue to open, causing late update of dialogue
Mistakes.NE_1007_Desc: Response #{0} in dialogue {1} has a recursive call to the parent dialogue
Mistakes.NE_1008_Desc: Dialogue {0} is out of projects ID range [{1};{2}].
Mistakes.NE_1009_Desc: Response #{0} in dialogue {1} has no text.
Mistakes.NE_2002_Desc: Vendor {0} [{1}] is out of projects ID range [{2};{3}].
Mistakes.NE_2003_Desc_Buy: Buying item #{2} in vendor {0} [{1}] has an ID of zero.
Mistakes.NE_2003_Desc_Sell: Selling item #{2} in vendor {0} [{1}] has an ID of zero.
Mistakes.NE_3003_Desc: Quest {0} [{1}] is out of projects ID range [{2};{3}].
Mistakes.NE_4000_Desc: Currency {0} has invalid GUID - invalid length
Mistakes.NE_4001_Desc: Currency {0} has invalid GUID - invalid format
Mistakes.NE_4002_Desc: Currency {0} has invalid entry with GUID {1} - zero value
Mistakes.NE_4003_Desc: Currency {0} does not have an entry with value of 1
Mistakes.NE_4004_Desc: Currency {0} does not have any entries
Mistakes.NE_0000_Solution: Change ID to the value that will be bigger than 2000
Mistakes.NE_0001_Solution: Change ID to the value that will be bigger than 0
Mistakes.NE_0002_Solution: Change ID of the equipped slot to the value that will be bigger than 0
Mistakes.NE_0003_Solution: Avoid using symbols that are restricted in filenames
Mistakes.NE_0004_Solution: Change ID to the one that is in set range
Mistakes.NE_1000_Solution: Add pages to the messages that does not contain any
Mistakes.NE_1001_Solution: Change ID to the value that will be bigger than 0
Mistakes.NE_1003_Solution: Either delete the page, or add the text to it
Mistakes.NE_1004_Solution: Add condition or reward of type 'Quest' to response
Mistakes.NE_1005_Solution: Add reward of type 'Quest' to response
Mistakes.NE_1008_Solution: Change ID to the one that is in set range
Mistakes.NE_1009_Solution: Add text to this response or remove it
Mistakes.NE_2000_Solution: Change ID to the value that will be bigger than 0
Mistakes.NE_2001_Solution: Either delete the vendor, or add items to it
Mistakes.NE_2002_Solution: Change ID to the one that is in set range
Mistakes.NE_2003_Solution: Change ID to the value that will be bigger than 0
Mistakes.NE_3000_Solution: Change ID to the value that will be bigger than 0
Mistakes.NE_3002_Solution: Either add rewards to the quest, or ignore this message
Mistakes.NE_3003_Solution: Change ID to the one that is in set range
Mistakes.NE_4003_Solution: Create an entry with value of 1

Notification.RecoverOnStart:
Looks like app has crashed last time.
Do not worry - your work has been saved.
Crash save was created at '{0}'

Do you want to load this project?
Notification.Simulation_Crashed:
Current simulation has crashed. More details in logs.
Do not panic, it doesn't mean that you're doing something wrong.
Just check your project in-game, it will most probably work just fine there!
Notification.Template_InvalidContext: This template is not valid for this context. It must be for something else.
Notification.Template_InvalidFile: This template file is not valid.
Notification.Template_Error: Something wrong happened while adding from template. See details in logs.
Notification.Configuration_OnExit: Restart the app to apply some changes.
Notification.Configuration_OnExit_NoRestart: Successfully applied changes. No need to restart the app.
Notification.Character_ID_Zero: Character ID can't be equal to zero
Notification.Dialogue_ID_Zero: Dialogue ID can't be equal to zero
Notification.Vendor_ID_Zero: Vendor ID can't be equal to zero
Notification.Quest_ID_Zero: Quest ID can't be equal to zero
Notification.Import_Project_Done: Imported {0} characters, {1} dialogues, {2} vendors, {3} quests, {4} currencies and {5} flag descriptions.
Notification.Export_Error: Something gone wrong. See logs for details.
Notification.Upload_Error: Could not upload mod to Workshop: {0}
Notification.Export_Character_Error: Can't export character {0}. See logs for details.
Notification.Export_Dialogue_Error: Can't export dialogue {0}. See logs for details.
Notification.Export_Vendor_Error: Can't export vendor {0}. See logs for details.
Notification.Export_Quest_Error: Can't export quest {0}. See logs for details.
Notification.Export_Error_IOException: Something happened while writing data. See logs for details.
Notification.Export_Error_UnauthorizedAccessException: Can't write data. Try to run app as an administrator.
Notification.Dialogue_Reply_Visiblity_TwoOrLessMessag: No sense in editing visibility if you have less than two messages.
Notification.Project_NotLoaded_Incompatible: File not compatible with this version of the app.
Notification.StartUp_Free: This app is absolutely free. If someone charged you for this app - report to BowieD. I will not refund you any money for this - but i'll try my best to make it stop.
Notification.StartUp_IconsNotGenerated:
During startup app couldn't find some icons for items. If you want to see all item icons in the app follow these steps

1. Open Unturned
2. Go to Main Menu
3.Open Workshop menu
4. Hit F1 on your keyboard
5. Click 'All Item Icons' in the top left corner
6. Wait until the game stops lagging

After all these steps icons will hopefully appear in the app.

Interface.UGC_AsUploaded: Leave empty to keep old value
Interface.Warning_Scale:
Looks like you've set UI Scale to values that exceed your screen.
Do you want to reset scale to default?
Interface.StartUp_ImportGameAssets_Content:
Do you want to import Unturned assets in the app for better experience?
Benefits include:
- Select existing assets with Right Mouse Button instead of manually entering IDs
- More accurate error check
- More accurate simulation
- Better display of items
- Export directly to Unturned

Note: importing assets may take some time
